def get_fpaths(LEX, CORPUS_DIR='/Volumes/qjd/promo/SocEmb/data/psaw/'):
    lex_path = f'{CORPUS_DIR}{LEX}' + "/*.csv"
    fpaths = glob(lex_path)
    return fpaths
